description: We use a combination of double-fold Mexican vanilla extract and Madagascar bourbon vanilla paste for this classic flavor.
Lavender flower water, wildflower honey. This flavor will make you feel like you’re drifting through a field in Provence… or maybe that’s just us.
Made with cocoa powder and Callebaut chocolate.
Vanilla ice cream with Oreo sandwich cookie pieces.
Made with butter, cream, and lots of coarse sea salt, this is our most popular flavor.
Made with cold-brewed Bean Traders espresso beans and sweetened condensed milk

What if we took our beloved Salted Butter Caramel ice cream and just mixed chunks of our homemade brownies right into it? What then?Well, we did that, and it’s good, so we’re calling it Salted Caramel Brownie and scooping it for you!
Coffee ice cream with pieces of chocolate chip cookies and butter cookies. [does not contain dates—we just thought it was a cute name]
Vanilla ice cream with chocolate-raspberry truffles and raspberry swirl.
Milk chocolate ice cream with pieces of devil’s food cake and a dark chocolate ganache swirl.
A vegan dark chocolate ice cream (pea protein base) with our housemade vegan pecan brownies mixed in.
A vegan pea protein based ice cream made with strawberry purée and vanilla.
Strawberry sorbet with pure rosewater blended in.
